name: Princesses of Public Domain
description:
What if the princesses from classic fairy tales never waited around for their princes to save them?  What if they took matters into their own hands?  Follow Snow White as she sets out to gather her other storybook colleagues to take on her evil step-mother.  This game was built by a Dad for her 8-year old daughter.  Although it was designed as a gateway for other RPGs and similar games, there are still some challenging puzzles and battles for the older adventurer!

Version 1.0
